name: - Prayer Wheel and Shadow man (Nepal series #15)-
description:
It's almost as if a shadow man is trying to turn the prayer wheel. We saw this disc as we came up the trail to Kyanjin Gumba village (2817 m). A prayer wheel is a cylindrical wheel on a spindle made of metal or wood. Traditionally, a mantra is carved or written on the outside of the wheel.

5616px X 3744px
